item.title: Angry Bird Meets Tooth
item.description:
The latest and greatest tooth pulling episode at the circus was done angry birds style. Simply tie tooth to bird
Pull back
and The result is one very happy, very adorable , toothless grin!

item.title: Another Circus First
item.description: The time had finally come for the tooth to be pulled. While our son was more than ready for it to come out, Dad was secretly uneasy about the venture. “He trusts me” Scott confided to me in the hallway, “What if I hurt him?” Then Scott got another one of his moments of sheer fatherhood brilliance. “I’ll let him do it,” he declared. He tied one end of the dental floss to his light saber and the other to his tooth.
